item.title: EULA
item.description:
1. Term of Use

2. Contact Information

For questions or concerns regarding this Agreement, please contact us at: Email: support@tapmapapp.org Website: http://tapmapapp.org/

item.title: Privacy
item.description:
Welcome to Tap Map, operated by tapmapapp.org. Your privacy is important to us.

1. Information We Collect

  • Authentication Data: Username, email, and password for account creation and authentication.
  • Location Data: We collect location information for the place your create. We use your location to position and route you to your next drink. We do not store any location information in relation to users.

2. How We Use Your Information

We use the collected data to match users based on their preferences, travel plans, and location.

item.title: Support
item.description:
For assistance, do not hesitate to contact our support team at the information provided below. We encourage you to consult our list of Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ).

Contact Support

For all other questions, we encourage your to contact our support team via email at: support@tapmapapp.org

item.title: FAQ
item.description:
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Beta Program FAQ

Wait! Why a Beta Program?

The app has been released, yet the beta goes on, we will post new features, bug fixes etc… on the beta line ahead of the store release. You can download the store release at the link below or from the home page.
